channel.title: olive oil on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in olive oil on Recipes

item.title: cod a la biscayan
item.description: 1 pound of cod 1-2 cup olive oil 2 sliced onions 1-2 cup tomato sauce 1-2 cup olives 1 tablespoon capers 2 cloves of garlic 1 pound sliced potatoes 2 roasted ripe peppers 1-4 cup raisins Put the cod in hot water, remove the skin and thorns and cut into medium-sized pieces. In a casserole put litters of cod, onions and potatoes, tomato sauce, olives, capers and raisins, garlic and strips of peppers.

item.title: marengo chicken
item.description: 1 tender chicken (about 1-1-2 kilos), broken into 4 pieces 1-2 cup olive oil 3 tablespoons cognac 1 medium onion, chopped 2 tablespoons flour 1 cup dry white wine 1 cube of chicken bouill√≥n 1-4 cup mashed tomatoes 3 sprigs of parsley 1 pinch of dried thyme 1 bay leaf, small 200 grams of fresh mushrooms slices 1 cup toasted croutons Pieces of po are sprayed llo, including the menudos, with sai and pepper.
